### Description

This request for proposal is issued by the Royal Canadian Navy (RCN) for the purpose of acquiring the services of one (1) or multiple Senior Academic Instructors. The selected applicants will instruct specific discipline-based courses, namely Electric Circuits and Controls, Mechanical Engineering, and Ship’s Stability at Canadian Forces Base Esquimalt in British Columbia. 

The selected instructors are required to provide high-quality teaching to government-owned academic courses and demonstrate expertise and understanding of the specific courses to be instructed.

* The contract duration is expected to start after the selection process and end by **June 30, 2026**.
